data.title: FootballPakistan.com (FPDC)
data.text:
Rogerio Ramos points out differences between Indian and Pakistani football [Express Tribune]

‚ÄúPlayers need time to develop better mentality. We have good players in Pakistan who want to play and like to play. But we need players to get competition, and play regularly,‚Äù said Pakistan MNT's Brazilian goalkeeping coach Rogerio Ramos.

Comment: Pele‚Äôs relevance in Pakistan went beyond the sport [Dawn]

Almost no one in Pakistan was lucky enough to see Pele in his glorious career, yet his name always had reverence and respect for decades.

PFF hires Marcelo as goalkeeping coach

Marcelo Costa Schroeder from Brazil hired by PFF as Pakistan men's national team goalkeeping coach. Marcelo had already served with Pakistan MNT in same coaching role back in 2019.

PFF NC appoints Brazilian trainer for national team [Dawn]

Shahzad Anwar‚Äôs Brazil connections get Rodrigo Esteves for Pakistan MNT camp as trainer. Shahzad had previously brought in Jose Nogueira and Beto Portella back in 2018.

Brazil‚Äôs Rodrigo hired as football team‚Äôs trainer [The News]

Rodrigo Esteves had worked with Shahzad Anwar at FC SKA Brasil. The Brazilian will now work with Pakistan MNT's prep camp in Lahore.
